Immerse yourself in the historic culture of the Hydrostone Market District at The Junction, a brand new 9-storey apartment community located in downtown Halifax.

Offering spacious 1 and 2 bedroom suites with open-concept layouts, these upscale apartments feature exposed concrete columns, in-suite laundry, and fully-equipped kitchens, all unified in a sleek and modern design. Spend an afternoon out on the podium terrace, or entertain for the evening inside the comfortable and stylish lounge, featuring a kitchen and communal dining area.

We invite you to set your roots in these stunning apartments with breathtaking views, overlooking the downtown Dartmouth skyline, Halifax Habour, and MacDonald Bridge.
